scenario_text.value:
Oh, Takuma. There doesn’t seem to be any
ghost here...

Hey, no need to be so scared. I don’t think
the boy from the shrine wants to hurt us.
I...I know that, but...

Being in an old school alone at night is
scary enough without a ghost. This is creepy.

B-besides, it’s not like I doubt you, but...
you never know, it could be an angry ghost...

(I guess I can see where they’re coming from.
I’d be scared too if it weren’t for Agumon.)

Listen, why don’t we all look around
together? Wouldn’t that be safer?

It would be much less efficient. Splitting up
as much as we can saves time.
Oh... I know that, but...

Hang in there, Saki. You’ve g-got me, d-don’t
you?

(They both seem pretty scared. I should try
and think of some way to cheer them up.)
(Who should I talk to?)
I’ll talk to Aoi.
I’ll talk to Saki.
I’ll talk to Renamon.
Aoi
Are you doing okay, Aoi?
Well...to be honest, I’m anything but okay.

But...if I let that show, it’ll only make
Saki more upset.

I get that, but don’t overdo it, okay? If it
starts to be too much, I’ll be here for you.
Really? You mean it?
But wait!

You can’t stay here. We need to find this
ghost as soon as possible.

Thanks, Takuma. Don’t worry about me, you
need to keep looking for the ghost.

B-but if things do get really bad, you’ll be
there to help, right?
Of course. I’ll keep you safe no matter what.
Saki
Saki...are you okay?
D-do I look like I’m okay?

Er, no, sorry. Would it help if I stayed with
you?
Oh... Mmm...
It would. It really, really would, but...

That’d just make trouble for you and everyone
else. So...I got this.
Okay. That’s really impressive, Saki.

But if things do get really bad, you can call
for me. I’ll come running.
All right. Thanks, Takuma.
If I call for you, you’d better come quick!
I will, don’t worry.
Renamon
Listen, Renamon...
What? Don’t tell me you think I’M scared.
No, it’s not that. I know you wouldn’t be.

But...would you mind staying with Aoi and
Saki so they don’t get too upset?

Hmph... I suppose as long as we’re all
searching this room, we’re sticking together.

I don’t know if it’s enough to keep them from
getting scared, but...I can stay here.
Thanks. That’ll be a big help.

You can leave this place to us, Takuma. You
keep looking around.
That’s right. We’ve g-got this.

(I’m still worried about those two, but...
I guess I should listen to them.)

D-don’t worry about us! We’re d-doing just
fine.
Nnngh... I’m not scared, I’m not scared...
